summary: The Family Building FEHB Fairness Act aims to expand access to fertility treatment under the health insurance program for federal employees (FEHB). The bill amends Title 5 of the United States Code to include fertility treatment benefits, defines "fertility treatment" to encompass various services like egg/sperm preservation, artificial insemination, IVF, medication, and gamete donation, and mandates these changes take effect one year after enactment.
